hero.title: The Future of Digital Payment
hero.subtitle: Zaho - A company specialized in innovative digital solutions and electronic financial services, we strive to develop the digital payment system in Libya

about.title: About Us – Zaho Company
about.subtitle: A leading company in digital financial solutions in Libya
about.description: Zaho is one of the companies specialized in innovative digital solutions and electronic financial services, seeking to develop the digital payment system in Libya by providing secure, flexible, and accessible services.
about.special1: Digital solutions that suit the Libyan market and respond to users' needs
about.special2: A young team with efficiency and flexibility in development and operations
about.special3: Commitment to the highest standards of security, quality, and service continuity
about.special4: High scalability and keeping pace with the growth of the digital sector locally
about.visionText: To be among the leading companies in digital payment and electronic financial services in Libya, and to play an active role in building a sustainable digital economy.
about.missionText: We aspire to enhance trust in digital services and facilitate access for individuals and institutions to modern and secure financial tools, contributing to financial inclusion and the transition to a less cash-dependent society.

hawelli.title: Our Main Product
hawelli.description: Discover Tahweeli Wallet, the advanced online bank that lets you manage your money easily and securely. Payment methods to meet your everyday needs.

services.title: Our Current and Future Services
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of digital financial services
services.serviceDesc1: We design and develop integrated electronic financial solutions that meet the needs of the Libyan market.
services.serviceDesc2: Building payment gateways and integration with banking and financial systems.
services.serviceDesc3: Providing advanced financial management tools for institutions and companies.
services.serviceDesc4: Supporting electronic payment operations and developing APIs.
services.serviceDesc5: Designing management systems for commercial points of sale and bill payments.
services.serviceDesc6: Providing technical consulting and specialized support for financial services.
services.service1: Development and operation of customized electronic financial solutions
services.service2: Building payment gateways and integration with banking systems
services.service3: Providing financial management tools for institutions and small companies
services.service4: Supporting electronic payment operations and developing APIs
services.service5: Designing management systems for commercial and service points

solutions.individualsDesc: Seeking easy and secure payment services
solutions.companiesDesc: Wanting to adopt modern electronic financial solutions
